mapper.sql: smei.month_end_inventory_id, smei.storage_id, smei.material_id, smei.box_number, smei.total, smei.`status`, smei.remark, smei.organization_id, smei.create_user_id, smei.create_time, smei.modified_user_id, smei.modified_time, smei.is_delete
mapper.select:
select ,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name ,sw.warehouse_name,swa.warehouse_area_name,ss.storage_name,sm.material_code,sm.material_desc, ssi.quantity,spm.product_model_name, ifnull(CEILING(ssi.quantity / ( select sps.package_specification_quantity from smt_package_specification sps where sps.package_specification_id = bt.package_specification_id )),0) AS box_number FROM storage_month_end_inventory smei LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON ssi.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON ssi.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON ssi.organization_id = bo.organization_id left join smt_storage ss on smei.storage_id = ss.storage_id left join smt_warehouse sw on sw.warehouse_id = ss.warehouse_id left join smt_warehouse_area swa on swa.warehouse_area_id = ss.warehouse_area_id left join smt_material sm on sm.material_id = smei.material_id left join base_tab bt on bt.material_id = ssi.material_id left join smt_product_model spm on spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id
and sw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and saw.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and spm.productModelName like CONCAT('%', #{productModelName}, '%')
